original_text: You said that, but now listen to this! 37: The Lord continues to speak his message to King Sennacherib. You must surely have heard it already. I decided what to do a long time ago! Now I am causing it to happen. I decided that you would destroy strong cities so that they became heaps of stones. You said that, but now listen to this!
korean_text: 네가 어찌하여 듣지 못하였느냐 이 일들은 내가 태초부터 행한 바요 상고부터 정한 바로서 이제 내가 이루어 네가 견고한 성읍들을 헐어 돌무더기가 되게 하였노라

sentences.original_text: You said that, but now listen to this!
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그렇게 말했지만, 이제 이 말을 들어보라!

sentences.original_text: The Lord continues to speak his message
You must surely have heard it already.
I decided what to do a long time ago!
Now I am causing it to happen.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 내가 그것이 일어나게 하고 있다.

sentences.original_text: I decided that you would destroy strong cities
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네가 강한 성들을 파괴할 것이라고 결정했다

sentences.original_text: so that they became heaps of stones.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그것들이 돌 무더기가 되게 하였다.

sentences.original_text: You said that, but now listen to this!
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그렇게 말했지만, 이제 이 말을 들어보라!
